page.title: 06Population And Housing
page.content:
At the time of counting (June 1985) 50 people live in the block. They have been divided into 4 groups as follows:
Pre_school :06 School Age :09 Adult :30 Retired :05 Total :50
There are 48 houses in the block. Of these 22 are holiday homes, and 26 are permanent residences. The holiday homes are mostly wooden chalets, but there are a few stone cottages among them. All the permanent homes except one are of the traditional type i.e. they have stone walls (quarried locally), and slated roofs.
